sentence: The service at the hotel was courteous and somewhat helpful when requested but a bit slow and not at all proactive
The services by the pool were all too expensive
I am extremely disappointed with the lack of urgency and how the issues were addressed by your staff
Front desk staff not nice
I could not have asked for a better service
We contacted the front desk who sent up the maintenance man who then went to get a plumber
On the last day I spoke to Yvone which would have been the third managerial staff person that I had spoken to in 5 days
I called the desk to find out there was no balcony a bc they were under construction
I called the front desk and asked when they found out they were closing since I had an email exchange with one of their agents just last week about what was going to be open closed during our stay
I must say Frances at the front desk is awesome and tries to help but there is only so much she can do
While the hotel is not completely up and running it was still an enjoyable trip and the staff was very nice and helpful
2 stars because the accommodations and check in staff are amazing but everything else is a hot mess
I was warmly greeted by a staff member who led me to the check in area
After waiting two hours I went down to the front desk and finally someone was able to help us
With that being said however the staff at the El San Juan did everything they could to make our experience better
But what really made our stay so amazing was the staff
We had been to the hotel just a few years ago and had received wonderful service
great facilities but extremely poor staff As gold member I have to tell staff I was and even though staff did not even bother to offer extra services
I pray that Puerto Rico will be stronger than before and I will never forget how wonderful your staff and your property is beautiful
I am a Diamond Member with Hilton and have experienced many hotel stays but I have to tell you that the crew at the El San Juan Hotel have set the bar very high for all other hotels
Amazing service very accommodating
The owners of the El San Juan hotel are very fortunate to have the dedicated kind hearted and friendly employees
This hotel is amazing and the customer service is great
But these disadvantages are compensated by the wonderful food and the wonderful staff which tries to help you every way they can
Great place to stay it ’s clean has a beautiful view to the ocean Food was also great and staff it ’s friendly
The front desk service was 1010 thanks Manuel Julisa Edwin and Jan for a great costumer service
Again the VIP treatment and being able to share with the staff who are family after your stay
The beach was lovely the pools were lovely the service was great
Thank you to the entire staff for a really great experience
The grounds hotel and staff are very beautiful here
